PXRD.equipment: Rigaku Mini Flex II X-ray diffractometer
PXRD.conditions: Cu-Kα radiation, 30 kV, 15 mA, scanning range 5–40° (2θ) at a rate of 1°/min

neutron_diffraction.equipment: BT-1 neutron powder diffractometer at NIST Centre for Neutron Research
neutron_diffraction.conditions: Ge(311) monochromator, λ = 2.0787(2) Å, in-pile collimation of 60 minutes of arc, range of 1.3-166.3° (2θ), step size of 0.05°
neutron_diffraction.sample_preparation: Fully activated ELM-12 sample loaded in a vanadium can equipped with a capillary gas line, temperature controlled by a closed-cycle He refrigerator

DFT_calculations.additional_info: semi-empirical addition of dispersive forces to conventional DFT included

adsorption_measurements.conditions: activated overnight under vacuum at 393 K

breakthrough_experiments.conditions: 298 K, 1.01 bar, flow rate 2 mL/min, He flow (100 mL/min) at 323 K for 30 min for regeneration

regenerability.conditions: He flow (100 mL/min) at 323 K for 30 min

structural_stability.conditions: after 2 years of storage under ambient conditions
structural_stability.results: retains structure, uptake capacity, and separation performance
